items.sentence: Tom and Mary were dancing, but not with each other.
Tom and Mary were sitting at a table in the corner.
I\'m hungry, so I\'m going to get something to eat.
Don\'t disappoint me the way you did the other day.
Mary got her boyfriend\'s name tattooed on her arm.
Mary is the only girl I\'ve ever been in love with.
I advise you not to borrow money from your friends.
We arrived at the station as the train was leaving.
I\'d like a chance to explain why I did what I did.
Tom said his parents allow him to do what he wants.
